lead_paragraph: The victims, a man and a woman, were found in an apartment in a public housing complex in Brooklyn, and the police were talking to a 15-year-old girl about the episode.

headline.print_headline: Two People Are Found Dead in an Apartment in Brooklyn
headline.main: Two Found Dead in Sheepshead Bay

snippet: The victims, a man and a woman, were found in an apartment in a public housing complex in Brooklyn, and the police were talking to a 15-year-old girl about the episode.
abstract: New York City police say bodies of man and woman were found in blood-spattered apartment in public housing complex in Sheepshead Bay area of Brooklyn; investigation into deaths is ongoing.
